pages.text: The amazing $(l:https://modrinth.com/mod/vics-point-blank)Point Blank$() mod included in the modpack let's you craft and use multiple real life firearms. The guns fit into the game balance as a late mid-game item, so you will have to work a bit to get them.
You can craft guns by getting the weapon printer and using it. The recipe is shown above.

pages.title: Arms Dealer
pages.text: Alternatively you can search for a big village that has the arms dealer villager with the building inside and purchase firearms for a good price from him.
